description: Detects Processes accessing the camera and microphone from suspicious folder
false_positives: Unlikely, there could be conferencing software running from a Temp folder accessing the devices
name: Suspicious Camera and Microphone Access
query: (winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\CapabilityAccessManager\\ConsentStore\\* AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\NonPackaged* AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*microphone* OR *webcam*) AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*\:#Windows#Temp#* OR *\:#$Recycle.bin#* OR *\:#Temp#* OR *\:#Users#Public#* OR *\:#Users#Default#* OR *\:#Users#Desktop#*))
author: Den Iuzvyk
